reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress classy, comfortable, and good value for money. The fit and sizing receive mixed feedback - while some say it fits perfectly and is true to size, others find it runs very small. The fabric quality, color, and wrinkle resistance also get mixed reviews. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Runs true to size
items.body: Lovely dress! Size chart is wrong. I’m 5’6” and 145 lbs. I ordered a large and it’s very loose and big in the shoulders. I typically wear a medium so I’m reordering in a medium. Ignore the chart and order your typical size. The material is nice and wrinkly resistant. Overall quality is great. Read more
items.author: Jean

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable yet Stylish
items.body: I wore this dress for an awards ceremony. I received lots of compliments in the dress. The dress did not show wrinkles after sitting. It is true to size and the fabric is soft and comfortable. I am 5’2” and ordered a small. Read more
items.author: MARSHA TRIBBLE

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful fall color dress
items.body: Beautiful dress and color. The material is very thin. Read more
items.author: Ms S.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, quality dress at a great price!
items.body: I received this dress today. I bought it to wear for my grandsons wedding. I tried it on and it fits perfect! I purchased the black dress in a size large. This dress is going to look gorgeous with shiny bling jewelry. The dress hugs you in all the right spots. This dress has a lovely flow! I am 5'3 and the length is perfect, classy, dressy, and looks so beautiful! Read more
items.author: Bernadette Trujillo

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous Fabric and Great Value, but Fit Varies
items.body: I previously purchased this dress in pink and loved it, so I ordered the navy in the same 2X size. The pink fit perfectly, but the navy ran noticeably larger—closer to a 3X. Since I had removed the tags, I couldn’t return it and will need to have it altered, which was disappointing. The dress itself is beautiful, flattering, and made of excellent-quality fabric. The value for the price is impressive; my only concern is the inconsistent sizing. Read more
items.author: J’Michel

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful
items.body: What a comfortable, adorable black dress. I wore it to my nephews black tie wedding and it was perfect. Dressed it up with heels and some silver jewelry. A must for your collection. Fit perfect. Read more
items.author: J.M.K.

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cheap looking product
items.body: Didn’t like the feel or the fit and missed return window Read more
items.author: wendi McLamb

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not a good purchase
items.body: Cheap material Poor construction Read more
items.author: frank

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening Formal Short Sleeve Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening Formal Short Sleeve Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: L-blush, Z-navy, Z-green, Z-teal, Z-royalblue, L-grape, Z-dark Green, Z-red, Z-teal Blue, Z-burgundy, Z-magenta, Z-black, L-greyblue, L-lightgreen. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
